column2: for those that don't love a great smoky rib
column3: or one that doesn't simply fall off the bone (read Twin Anchor style)
column4: then this might not be for you.  However
column5: if the smoke flavor is what you're looking for (combined with great rubs and sauces)
column8: be sure to at least try their sample portions of the pulled pork (nice and chunky)
column9: and sliced brisket (super moist/melt in your mouth).  Both of them were equally as phenomenal.
